text: Valério Breda (24 January 1945 - 16 June 2020) was an Italian-born Brazilian Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1973. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Penedo, Brazil, from 1997 until his death in 2020.Diocese of Penedo Breda died on 16 June 2020, aged 75.Morre dom Valério Breda, bispo de Penedo (AL), aos 75 anos ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Maceió
title: Valério Breda
